## Solution 1

The first solution:

```{r title="{{ site.handouts }}"}
(-0.3 + sqrt(0.3 ^ 2 - 4 * 1.5 * -2.9)) / (2 * 1.5)
```

The second solution:

```{r title="{{ site.handouts }}"}
(-0.3 - sqrt(0.3 ^ 2 - 4 * 1.5 * -2.9)) / (2 * 1.5)
```

## Solution 5

```{r title="{{ site.handouts }}"}
df <- data.frame(
    size = 1:5,
    year = factor(
        c(2014, 2014, 2013, 2015, 2015),
	levels = c(2013, 2014, 2015),
	ordered = TRUE),
    prop = runif(n = 5))
fit <- lm(prop ~ size + year, data = df)
```

```{r}
summary(fit)
```
